name: idocz
tag_list: enterprise-content-management, information-management, application-development, calgary-canada, drafting, docuement-scanning, document-management
overview:
idocz provides custom business solutions with a focus on Information Management. Through their three departments, Document Processing, Drafting, and Software Services, they address the full circle needs of document and information management, from digitization to full scale implementation projects.

The software services division of idocz provides application development and configurations as well as support and administration with a focus of content and records management tools and systems.

Enterprise Content Management is more than a technology, it is a business practice involving solution design expertise, governance, change management and multiple technologies to capture, move and manage unstructured content. idocz addresses this by merging business processes with technology to provide you with a holistic Enterprise Content Management solution. Their technical experts have extensive experience configuring, customizing and integrating ECM systems with other applications to meet the content management requirements of their clients.
